Special Powers
ELECTRIC CHARGE: Charge. When Mary Shazam uses it, this turn she has "FREE: [Improved Targeting Adjacent: This character can make range attacks while adjacent to opposing characters.], make a range attack that deals 1 penetrating damage instead of normal damage."

Comments
March 11, 2021
Brundun94
Best Mary Shazam of the set. Very mobile/flexible, good longevity. She's a STOP click killer in a game with ever increasing effects to prevent alpha strikes. She can be great against other tentpoles and also do well against swarms, and punishes you late for sticking around. Throw the ww branclets on her to make mid dial a tough out (her most vulnerable point on the dial). Great team player top dial, too. She offers much diversity in what she can bring to a team, so that it would be a tough call to decide what to outwit on her, if you build well around her. It takes very little investment in supporting characters to make her a serious threat. I didn't expect the uncommon form to impress me the most, but I'm not mad about that, especially now that it gives me a cheap option to replace the sculpt from WF Mary Marvel.
